page.title: 15CAREWELL FRUIT FARM
page.content: Carewell Fruit and Vegetable Farm is a Pick Your Own Centre in Lingfield. It has many facilities including a large, drained car park and is open nearly all the year round. The fruit for picking is available from the end of June beginning with strawberries and gooseberries, with raspberries in early July, redcurrants, blackcurrants and loganberries mid July with cultivated blackberries ending the season in August. The vegetables offered for picking vary from potatoes and carrots to the more exotic courgettes and garlic. Parents can leisurely spend their time picking for their freezers whilst their children can play in the large sandpit made available to them, as well as the huge field with a shady tree ideal for picnicing beneath.
